values:
It's been like, forever since I'd post an entry on my live journal but summer got my bored and ready to start post again...the only problem I'm really talking to air so it's very strange to me when I'm writing while thinking there someone else reading me...

OHW~sound kinky...^^, okay never mind.

Summer already showing it's tail and I'm quiet restless about it for few reasons:

1.I really didn't done much all the summer, even though I made a lot of fun with my not-so-big bank credit but wasting money it's always fun until it end.

2. I became Naruto bitch... don't really know how it happened, Amir just once gave my to read the first volume and I though it's nice, not more than that but he, as already self declared Naruto bitch (but in the end he's really a gamer) my good friend decided to annoy me enough to find scanlations of the manga and everything else it is history.

3. The same friend went to a family trip within USA and left me really craving for human contact (or at least some Naruto fan who isn't also a Yaoi fanatic but don't get wrong I'm half-dyke myself)

4. No real social life, No real love life, Not even very productive life as I'm too lazy to write something edible for the mind.

5. I'm fat, I'm REALLY REALLY fat...now I'm weighting maybe ten kilograms more since the beginning of the summer, and I don't want to be so fat...BUT DIETS ARE EVIL! Okay. Maybe only Sasuke's hair it's like that but I'm still small fat piggy, hunk.


one good thing about my pathetic existence is the first Anime Con of Israel, even although by no meaning great as even the crappiest cons of others part of the world but it was good beginning for the anime fans of this small country.

But who care when the good part id the merchandise?
Two BEAUTIFUL wall scrolls of 'Serial Experiments Lain'
One adorable Gaara keychain (he is so worshipable!)
A great pin of the rose seal from the 'Revolutionary girl Utena'
Another absolutely awesome Gaara poster (I'm starting slowly build a shrine for him *.*)
and finally before trying to get copy of the manga 'Confidential confessions' , I saw very hard-to-find merchandise on the nearer stand,
A Shirt...an X shirt, X as another beautifully illustrated manga of CLAMP (but damn! I can start a pillow factory with all the feathers!) and mind you but in my little country very hard to find any clothing merchandise!

I wanna BrB a little about the cosply (the good, the bad and the ugly) but It's early in the morning now and my Insomniac tendencies kept my all night again, so I need my coffee...

Sigh...lonely life I'm having, I'm becoming the symbol of freakiness in my boarding school though I'd preferred something like: lady from the pits Oo; O.K... Bit strange but highly applying. I'm feeling ignored and it is a bad thing! Ignored -> lazy-> bored-> apathy->tired and it seems as my poetry just getting effected or being tucked down without notice, I really like then people response to my poems but most of the people I'm known with are just lack the ability to react or they just English ignorant. So here one of my last writing, just strange poem which could become a lyrics if I wasn't so bad with composing ~Idol~ The last time I closed my eyes, I saw you You were next to him, you were beside me I just remember another moment of unbelieving, you trashed it all for him, just in front of my face Why my wishes came true? Holding the tapes, screaming a name, beginning from scratch again, I saw you two there Oh sweet melody, goddess of gold Oh sweet melody, prey of muses Truth, music, tears, on stage, happiness, fans mail, hope It all happen right in front of me holding the tapes, screaming a name, Beginning from scratch again, I saw you two there Year ago he laughed, year after that I cried, On T.V. someone already died while another song playing in the background Erasing it all from the old tapes, leaving nothing of you but the last time I closed my eyes, I saw him glad and began again to cry. Holding the tapes, screaming a name, beginning from scratch again, I saw only him there

Blaa ,life unfair for the milion and twelwe time already, my computer broke down few weeks ago and only day and a half ago it came back from the dead, but It crazy now to try to do something on him now that I'm seppuse to do Technology work about "Medical herbs and their uses against overweight", again blaa.. I really cought up with my fanpics this days, but the main one "Sacrifice Me" just giving my the biggest headache since I lefy NY for the favor of my not very loving home in Israel...ahhh I'm still missing this city! even the annoying remarks of my also somehow not so loving grandma were ok all if I could go buy Pocky again... I already had dreams about it...I has always dreams then I'm nned for something, Like my chocolate candy bars I dreamed about year ago after so much time I was stuck inside my boarding school... I bought during the holidays Hellsing wallScroll ^^ and Ragnarok Chibies poster! else another poster got my sister and she really annoying me now! I the one who always paying and for once she can't pay for me?! now my parents watching T.V and I'm almost done with the work...I still think it's going to came out bad and my work partner going to kill me for some reason. I want Pocky! POCKY! where are you now, my sweet japanese snack? oh whatever...I back in the school in a few hours and I need to get things down.

I really HATE my life! Tomorrow my birthday and I have bad feeling about it...like ever, and I going become more depressed tonight with my new emotions switch that began few days ago...first I'm happy and then I want to sob because I happy! It's really pathetic *sigh* tomorrow going to be worse because it seems that going to be rain in NY at least for four days from tomorrow so I hardly believe I can move somewhere without car (grandpa and grandma don't own car...I think because my grandma health Ideas --;) so I going to be stock on my birthday at home without a cake or company except granny! And with all the respect...I prefer burn myself right now...but at least I going to back home in like 12 days and festival will be good in that area of time ^^ yay I has luck after all! But it don't delete my frustrated mode...*fall dead on the floor* ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~



this is my way to live
What about yours?
made by rav-chan

I such quizes groopy --; but I love this one dearly! Xl

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Sunless eve, I'm waiting alone, for the apple blossom, Stars and skies left behind, the reality of dying smile, Sweets and hugs will not arrest, the memory of my love Oh dance with him lady moon, show him the sadness inside, List of endless fights start and continue with sorrow, Broken water mirror, which couldn't lie, showed me the one I need to find, Black butterflies brought him message from the silver maiden, I, who waited, trapped inside mercurian bubble, stayed sleeping forever. Did he hear the silent? Did she melt and gone? Do you have mercy for another lonely mermaid? I feel, empty beaches, loud streets, and continue… The spring gone, or so they say, the apple tree burn, My love didn't washing away even then I see them alone, Five elements that rebuild with time, behind fairy wall, Fire of desire, air of wish, water of tears, earth of blood, Covered and prejudice by the humanity, weak spirit surrendered painful heart. Merry came merry part, Love born, lovers depart, The willing hearts, deserve paid, And end...but of that? He the one that didn't die; he the one that didn't live, the hunt began, Run from the persecutors, run from the dogs, run from your princess, Bathing in blood, to spy on his lover he back, she kiss and laugh, Back on the earth she was crying, her angels all fall, Ray of light, we hear her joy, Hand in hand, lips to lips, two voices in harmony, The tell didn't come to its end, yet. Flowers of pink and black, birds of unknown white, I sit in the sunny Wally, humming to him, hope for feeling return But for now...swirling dancers of wind, spotted clouds, As I dream about the meaning of this stories, He sits beside seedling and hum. ~'Love Wish' by me, I wrote this one while ago for valentine day, one of my longest poems in English, and I really wish I could've give it to someone on the last valentine but no luck...probably if there someone I wrote different kind of poem but it probably one of my interesting love poems I ever wrote both in Hebrew and English ^^;
-Sensitive- You're Sensitive, and you'd like to
stay that way. Sorry,listened to a bit too much
Jewel there. You're sweet and very emotionally
charged. You definitely love the person you're
with, and always want to know how they're
feeling so you can make sure they're happy.

What Kind of Girlfriend Are You?
brought to you by Quizilla I'm pretty sensitive --; I really not such people pleasers or something but I really think this get the main point, I really want to know often how the person I love feel like, even if angst one of my favorite emotions I prefer him or her happy *sigh* I begin to jealous in each lovely-dovey couple I know...but the fact they're couple make me else fly from joy because I so love couples! I don't know about helpless romantic but I even collect pictures of couples, mostly on the computer of course, I be pleased to get picture, painting or sketch some one did of couples, anime and manga couples great too, and I love alternative couples though not all the time.

Yeah I love this one ^6^! you probably wondered for a minute where about why the heck were are two names, Shiro as not very hard to guess is just another nickname who became for life-time, by the hands of choosing randomly in few minutes, one year ago and a half...I think ^^; I and my sisters start project called 'Power Fan Girls' or just PFG by the hands of our fans (in this case, Ko-chan), it supposed to be extreme story about three rabid fan girls sisters and their very unieq self, in other words, what happen then fangirls got powers --; in this case a powers that really effect on your beloved animes, mangas, games, fan-pics and even web-comics, this characters based on me and my sisters with very twisted and well established facts, because after we did the first episode (took us like 11 pages of handwritten and a 6 or 7 on computer, maybe just five on the computer) I got ditched to do all the work myself (after all I'm the writer gal --;...I still think they should've help me out) but because I'm lazy piece of ham there are like 3 episodes fully written ^^; really not my fault I had and still has alot of other projects myself, original as fan-pics, but I really trying to do my best this summer! ... Oh back to the origin of this name...I and my sisters couldn't absolutely go by our original names (they sucks anyway, at least that the opinion of two of us) so as a nice cuddly story about obsessive and drooling fan girls, they all got new-Japanese related-names, from that day on the big sister was Akima (I and my lil' sister pick it ^^ mostly because Yulia creative as bucket of garbage even though she the pretties of us *sigh*) the middle child girl called under the name Shiro (it's me...always mass-up with names, called her after some movie assassin chick I'd seen probably then I was nine, and Ten-Chan said it sound as name of some super evil anime guy ;-;) and lil' one called Naiko (she always get the cutest names! even though it mean something like empty void ...really don't know) and the last one kept her name under the fierce shape of lovely three head dog (without connect to Harry Potter first book!...we just always imagine her like that seen we got her! laying in the basement, chewing some human bones that I throw her after the first assault of a little bitch powers from our dear big sister on some innocent human being...truly was connected with the dog that guarding the underworld in the mythology stories like everything else) so this is how I stuck with the name...It sure was long story. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Today I was walking half Manhattan with my grandma after stores from a list I got on the net, basically I was on manga hunting in each bookstore you can imagine, I else find few very nice occult books but I was tied with the mission of finding mangas so I hide my hands in my pockets, the fist was nice but wasn't that I needed, I passed few shops, one wasn't no where to be found and probably already moved or closed, other was pure Japanese store (Oh ;;-;; how lucky they to be able know this language!) the final stop was Kinokuniya Bookstore, in this place I'd fulfill my lil' sister request! I got her present of the first three books of Card Captor Sakura! She just loves the clamp stuff...so do I! But she love more ^^ I wanted dearly to buy Escaflone *sigh* but find myself broke after volumes 2 and 3 of gravitation, volume 3 of Pita Ten and the first cheeky angel...I wanted to buy something more dark and nice like red sisters or the 5 volume of pet shop of horror, but I has sisters to consider about...for strange reason my lil' one prefer the cuddly ones over the bloody ones; -;! Really not fair that I'm such considered sister! But I already bought 2 books of Demon Dairy, 3 of fruit basket and second of Pita ten month ago...so it's going to be alot of books carrying back to Israel...but I hope to get few money presents for my birthday (it's not like I'm greedy -- I just want to buy few more gifts home^^;) I else having hard time with the DDR issue *sob* probably I'm going to work or something first on PS2 before I get the game, but it really disappointing not to find DDR for the people without the advance game technology like Xbox or PS2...I don't think they so much advance but they do if I want to get sometime DDR before I get too much fat and old. *brust of happiness* I'm really in good mood today! shopping like this always make it better !*^6^*!
